roleset.name: supervise, control, with a partner

example.name: Both args
example.text: Managing the bond issue is a group of investment banks headed by First Boston Corp. and co - managed by Goldman , Sachs & Co. , Merrill Lynch Capital Markets , Morgan Stanley & Co. , and Salomon Brothers Inc .

propbank.arg: by Goldman , Sachs & Co. , Merrill Lynch Capital Markets , Morgan Stanley & Co. , and Salomon Brothers Inc

roleset.note: COMANAGE-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on Newswire, 'manage.01'. No VNcls. (from comanage.01-v)
